column4: I've got a problem; I'm trying to install Wine in Kubuntu, but I don't know how to change the repositories in Kynaptic. When I try to install it with apt-get, it says: "E: malformed line 28 in source list", while I don't find any errors.
hm. try to put `./' on the end.
do you mean to put it after the last slash, or underneath?
make it look like: deb-src http://wine.sourceforge.net/apt/source/ ./
it works now. Thanks for the information!!!
nope, I'm using atp-get; not synaptic, since that isn't included in Kubuntu
it gives that error when I try to do the update
hm... your hosts should look like: <2_char_country_code>.archive.ubuntu.com
but for now be.archive.ubuntu.com points to same as archive.ubuntu.com (or my DNS tells me lies)
I tried us.archive.ubuntu.com and be.archive.ubuntu.com; they all work fine in my browser, but for some reason the apt-get can't connect to them
